headline: KKR Makes Second Residential Investment in Stockholm with Three Asset Multifamily Development in Täby
summary: STOCKHOLM, July 01, 2025--KKR, a leading global investment firm, today announced the agreement with leading Swedish developer Reliwe for the forward funding of a new multifamily development in Täby, one of Stockholm’s most sought-after municipalities. The transaction marks KKR’s second residential investment in Sweden’s capital region since the beginning of 2025.
